description: Comprehensive social media sentiment and behavioral analysis dashboard

charts.title: Total Posts Analyzed
charts.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_posts FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.social_posts` WHERE DATE(created_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

charts.title: Average Sentiment Score
charts.query: SELECT ROUND(AVG(sentiment_score), 3) as avg_sentiment FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.sentiment_analysis` WHERE DATE(analyzed_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

charts.title: Unique Authors
charts.query: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT author_id) as unique_authors FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.social_posts` WHERE DATE(created_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)

charts.title: Posts Over Time
charts.query: SELECT DATE(created_at) as date, COUNT(*) as post_count FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.social_posts` WHERE DATE(created_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY date

charts.title: Sentiment Distribution
charts.query: SELECT sentiment_label, COUNT(*) as count FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.sentiment_analysis` WHERE DATE(analyzed_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY sentiment_label

charts.title: Top Platforms by Volume
charts.query: SELECT platform, COUNT(*) as post_count FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.social_posts` WHERE DATE(created_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY platform ORDER BY post_count DESC LIMIT 10

charts.title: Sentiment Trends Over Time
charts.query: SELECT DATE(s.analyzed_at) as date, s.sentiment_label, AVG(s.sentiment_score) as avg_score FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.sentiment_analysis` s WHERE DATE(s.analyzed_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(s.analyzed_at), s.sentiment_label ORDER BY date

charts.title: Sentiment by Platform and Time
charts.query: SELECT p.platform, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM p.created_at) as hour, AVG(s.sentiment_score) as avg_sentiment FROM `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.social_posts` p JOIN `${PROJECT_ID}.sentinelbert_${ENVIRONMENT}.sentiment_analysis` s ON p.post_id = s.post_id WHERE DATE(p.created_at) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY p.platform, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM p.created_at)
